item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "Sure, everything is ending," Jules said, "but not yet." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Elizabeth Scott
item.description: "Things end. People leave. And you know what? Life goes on. Besides, if bad things didn't happen, how would you be able to feel the good ones?" -- Elizabeth Scott

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "Just because something is unspoken doesn't mean that it disappears." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "When I walk, I walk with you. Where I go, you're with me always." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "In losing a friend, she is reminded of all she has lost and all she stands to lose again. There is nothing to be done to make it any easier. We all grieve alone." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Sarah McCoy
item.description: "The marks on our lives are like music notes on the page--they sing a song." -- Sarah McCoy

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Brenda Ueland
item.description: "I learned...that inspiration does not come like a bolt, nor is it kinetic, energetic striving, but it comes into us slowly and quietly and all the time, though we must regularly and every day give it a little chance to start flowing, prime it with a little solitude and idleness." -- Brenda Ueland

item.title: Jocelyn add a quote by Liane Moriarty
item.description: "Falling in love was easy.anyone could fall. It was holding on that was tricky" -- Liane Moriarty
